name: Dashy Dashy
description:
My first proper game prototype. Arrange the sequence of dashes, charge to define their length, and try to get to the end of the level while avoiding orange blocks. 

All assets made by myself (except for the font).

ps my personal best time is around 10 minutes

---
Controls:
1,2,3,4 || Set each dash direction
Left, right || Horizontal movement
Down (hold) || Charge dash
---

---
Tips:
- Hitting green blocks during a dash will cancel the rest of the sequence
- Respawn position is saved when charging a dash
---
